Amb_Phrase: ['You hereby provide your unconditional consent or agreements to the PhonePe Entities (including but not limited to PhonePe Private Limited, PhonePe Technologies Private Limited , PhonePe Wealth Services Private Limited) as provided under the information technology act, 2000 and the rules and regulations made under therein for accessing any of the PhonePe platform.\n']

['Though every effort would be made to keep you aware of any changes to the Privacy Policy, you are kindly advised to review the policy periodically on the App to ensure that you are aware of the latest version.\n']

['"PhonePe Service" shall include all services extended / to be extended by PhonePe and PhonePe entity as a group including but not limited to PPI, PA, PG, BBPOU, AA, Insurance, MF, Gold sale & purchase, Bill payment & recharge, switch including others.\n']
['We offer certain features that are only available through the use of a "cookie". "']
['Our Privacy Policy is subject to change at any time without notice and the same shall be updated and available within PhonePe App and on its website at www.phonepe.com from time to time.']
['Though every effort would be made to keep you informed of the changes, if any, to the policy, you are kindly advised to review the policy periodically.']
['This allows us to provide services and features that most likely meet your needs, and to customize our Website/Application to make your experience safer and easier.']
['More importantly, while doing so we collect personal information from you that we consider necessary for achieving this purpose.\n']

['Provided that, any information that is freely available or accessible in public domain or furnished under the Right to Information Act, 2005 or any other law for the time being in force shall not be regarded as Sensitive Personal Information and may be regarded as Personal Information.\n']
['We and our Service Providers may collect non-personal data while you access PhonePe platforms via url, smartphones or any other mobile devices.']
['Information may be collected in various ways and formats during the course of your visit or access to PhonePe Platforms by way of -\nVisiting PhonePe platforms.\n']
['Registering on PhonePe platforms as an “user” or “merchant” or any other relationship that may be governed by terms and conditions listed on PhonePe platforms.\n']

["Otherwise dealing with any of the “PhonePe Entities”\nWe and our Service Providers or Business Partners may also collect information made publicly available through other third-party platforms, through online or offline databases that are otherwise legitimately obtained and are subject to the third party's terms of use and/or privacy statement.\n"]
['We may automatically track certain information about you based upon your behaviour on our App.']

['We and our Service Providers use data collection tools such as cookies/similar,etc on certain pages of the app to help analyse our app page flow, measure promotional effectiveness, and promote trust and safety.']

['We offer certain features that are only available through the use of a "cookie"\nWe and our Service Providers also use cookies to allow you to enter your password less frequently during a session.']
['Cookies can also help us provide information that is targeted to your interests.']

['Most cookies are session cookies, You are always free to decline our cookies if your device permits, although in that case you may not be able to use certain features on the app and you may be required to re-enter your password more frequently during a session\nPurpose and Use of Information\n']
['We aspire to provide services and features that most likely meet your needs, and to customize our Website/Application to make your experience safer and easier.']
['PhonePe may collect, use, store and transfer your Personal Information including Sensitive Personal Information and Non-personal information for the following purposes\n']
['These surveys may ask you for contact information and demographic information (like zip code, age, or income level).']
['We use this data to tailor your experience at our app, providing you with content that we think you might be interested in and to display content according to your preferences.\n']
['Your data may be collected, stored and processed in countries other than Indian Jurisdictions by Us or our Service Providers as permitted under applicable laws.\n']

['Your data may be shared with the internal investigation department within PhonePe Entities or agencies appointed by PhonePe Entities for investigation purposes located within or outside Indian Jurisdictions.\n']

['We may disclose personal information if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such disclosure is reasonably necessary to respond to subpoenas, court orders, or other legal process.']

['We may disclose personal information to law enforcement offices, third party rights owners, or others in the good faith belief that such disclosure is reasonably necessary to: enforce our Terms or Privacy Policy']
['; respond to claims that an advertisement, posting or other content violates the rights of a third party; or protect the rights, property or personal safety of our users or the general public.\n']
['We and our affiliates will share / sell some or all of your personal information with another business entity']
['To the extent permitted by law, we may share information with them for specific purposes not limited to investigation or forensics.\n']

['Retention period - We retain your information for as long as needed or permitted considering the purpose(s) for which it was obtained and will retain this information till such period as prescribed under applicable law.\n']

['PhonePe is an ISO27001 and PCI-DSS certified entity and has deployed technical and physical security measures to safeguard user’s Personal Information and Sensitive Personal Information and undergo strict internal and external reviews to ensure appropriate information security encryption or controls are placed for both data in motion and data at rest within our network and servers respectively.\n']
['We have provided multiple levels of security to safeguard your App by Login/Logout option and Application Lock feature (“Enable Screen Lock”) that can be enabled by you.']
['We have preventive controls implemented to ensure you use PhonePe App on your device and same login can not be used on different device without any additional authentication/OTP.']
['When you choose to make payment on PhonePe platforms via cards, some part of your card information is stored in compliance with Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard.\n']
['All Sensitive Personal Information and some part of your Personal Information shall be retained under applicable laws.']
['Non-Personal Information may be retained even after termination of relationship between you and PhonePe Entities.\n']
['Links to Other Platforms - Our app links to other platforms may collect personally identifiable information about you.']

['Links to third-party advertisements, websites or any other electronic communication service may be provided on PhonePe platforms, which are operated by third parties and are not controlled by, or affiliated to, or associated with, the PhonePe Entities.']

['Information Breach - While We shall take all reasonable and appropriate processes and precautions to secure any Personal Information//Sensitive Personal Information which We hold about You, You acknowledge that no data transmission over the internet is fully secure, so we cannot provide any assurance or warrant the security of any information you submit to us.\n']

['Review your Personal Information & Sensitive Personal Information - You may review your Personal Information and Sensitive Personal Information shared by You by logging info PhonePe platforms using your secure login credentials and may notify Us in case of any change.\n']
['The information so provided by You may be shared to PhonePe Entities and the third-party service provided on a need to know basis.\n']

['This disclosure may be required for us to provide you access to our Services, to comply with our legal obligations, to enforce our User Agreement, to facilitate our marketing and advertising activities, or to prevent, detect, mitigate, and investigate fraudulent or illegal activities related to our Services.']

['We provide all users with the opportunity to opt-out of receiving non-essential (promotional, marketing-related) communications from us on behalf of our partners, and from us in general, after setting up an account.']

['By using the PhonePe platforms and/ or by providing your information, you consent to the collection and use of the information you disclose on the app in accordance with this Privacy Policy, including but not limited to Your consent for sharing your information as per this privacy policy.']

['In rare circumstances where, owing to various human, network or system errors, some issues arise requiring a more focused and customised redressal, You may refer to the following redressal mechanism in the sequential order.\n']
['For queries and concerns that are not addressed through the help pages, You can contact our customer support team through phone, email or through PhonePe App.\n']
[':\nYou can register your complaint with PhonePe Customer Support by clicking on the icon on the home page of the PhonePe App.\n']
['Resolution of Your complaint may get delayed due to operational or technical reasons.']
['In a few scenarios while the resolution to a complaint is instant, it may take time for it to get reflected in the system.']
['For example, refund approval can be instant, but it may take 3-10 days to reflect money into the account.']
['Complaints related to ‘fraud and risk assessment’ often take longer to investigate due to involvement of multiple agencies.']
[': You can access any of the following channels to escalate Your concerns if they have not been satisfactorily resolved at Level 1.\n']
['If your concern/query remains unresolved, can escalate the matter to our Grievance/Nodal officer.']
['If you are a PhonePe Wallet holder and your query or complaint has not been satisfactorily resolved at previous levels within 30 days, you can reach out to the digital ombudsman.']
